body:
FWIW, I've made some changes in Ubuntu recently, partly in support of having multiple Go versions installed at once, and I'm planning on getting similar changes into Debian too.  My stuff is all in 

https://git.launchpad.net/~mwhudson/ubuntu/+source/golang/+git/xenial/

and

https://git.launchpad.net/~mwhudson/ubuntu/+source/golang-defaults/+git/xenial
